descriptor.doc: A landform or physical feature. Landform elements include mountains, plains, lakes, rivers, seascape and oceanic waterbody interface features such as bays, peninsulas, seas and so forth, including sub-aqueous terrain features such as submersed mountain ranges, volcanoes, and the great ocean basins.

An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
Physical address of the item.
The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.
The basic containment relation between places.
A short description of the item.
Upcoming or past event associated with this place or organization.
Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization (legacy spelling; see singular form, event).
The fax number.
The geo coordinates of the place.

The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.
URL of an image of the item.
A count of a specific user interactions with this item—for example, 20 UserLikes, 5 UserComments, or 300 UserDownloads. The user interaction type should be one of the sub types of UserInteraction.
The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.
URL of an image for the logo of the item.
A URL to a map of the place.
A URL to a map of the place (legacy spelling; see singular form, map).
The name of the item.
The opening hours of a certain place.
A photograph of this place.
Photographs of this place (legacy spelling; see singular form, photo).
A review of the item.
Review of the item (legacy spelling; see singular form, review).
The telephone number.
URL of the item.
